name: bj-notalbii
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wn(w0)), wal(s0, wn(w1)))
-| wb(wn(w0), wn(w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wn(w0)), wal(s0, wn(w1)))
-| wb(wn(w0), wn(w1))

|- wb(wal(s0, wn(w0)), wal(s0, wn(w1)))
-| wb(w0, w1)

comment: Equivalence of universal quantification of negation of equivalent formulas. Shortens ~ ab0 (103>94), ~ ballotlem2 (2655>2648), ~ bnj1143 (522>519), ~ hausdiag (2119>2104). (Contributed by BJ, 17-Jul-2021.)
